This isn't really NTR guys. There was literally one slide worth of interactions between the boy and girl where she rejected him. She has zero feelings for him and he just had a one-sided crush that got rejected. There is no cheating or anything since they aren't dating and are not romantically involved whatsoever.
Yes there is the NTR tag in there but it's kind of misplaced in the first place as there is no netorare - cheating.
I get it that you guys want to associated with the MC and want every girl to be a pure virgin that is going to love you forever like in a fairy-tale but that isn't the case here.
Is there a part two? seems like there would be.
If this were a stronger ntr i would understand the coments but this is as vanilla as it gets
